title: Pixel 6a apparently won’t support ‘Motion Mode’ photos in Google Camera
content:
The Pixel 6a is coming up soon and brings a lot to the table, but it seems the phone won’t support a feature from its flagship brethren. According to some new evidence, it seems the Pixel 6a won’t support “Motion Mode” photography.

more…

The post Pixel 6a apparently won’t support ‘Motion Mode’ photos in Google Camera appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to evidence from one of Google's apps, it seems like "Motion Mode" photography won't be supported on Pixel 6a.
